Orphapacket.Label: Primitive neuroectodermal tumor of the corpus uteri

Synonyms.Synonym: Malignant peripheral neuroectodermal tumor of the corpus uteri
Peripheral neuroectodermal cancer of the corpus uteri

TextSection.Contents: Primitive neuroectodermal tumor of the corpus uteri is a rare cancer of corpus uteri derived from neural crest cells characterized by small round neoplastic cells with variable degree of neural glial and ependymal differentiation. Macroscopically the tumor is often a large poorly circumscribed polypoid mass with necrotic areas and hemorrhage. It usually presents with lower abdominal or pelvic pain irregular vaginal bleeding or discharge pelvic mass and uterine enlargement.
